Key Match Events: Tabraiz Shamsi was named Player of the Match for his 4/60.
Marco Jansen was named Cricinfo's MVP with 160.22 points.
South Africa won by 1 wicket with 16 balls remaining.
Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets for 45 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Usama Mir replaced Shadab Khan as a concussion substitute during the 15th over of South Africa's innings.
Pakistan elected to bat first after winning the toss.
The match was held at MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chepauk, Chennai.
